pr_title: SONARJAVA-3478 Support Collection and Map methods

timeline.bodyText: Note that to me these issues are FP... but these are ugly things. WeakHashMaps have mechanisms to clear unused objects. Here, they force calls to clearing methods, in a way forcing the normal garbage collection. So even if it's a FP, I would leave with it as it is as long as no one complains. Also, detecting the runtime type of an object is NOT trivial.
timeline.author: m-g-sonar

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3478 Move test files in dedicated compiling project
